# looker_user_roles (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "looker_user_roles" "user_roles" {
  user_id  = looker_user.user.id
  role_ids = [looker_role.role.id]
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `role_ids` (Set of String)
- `user_id` (String)

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
